moves.name: Superpower
moves.description: The user attacks the target with great power. However, it also lowers the user's Attack and Defense.

moves.name: Reversal
moves.description: An all-out attack that becomes more powerful the less HP the user has.

moves.name: Tackle
moves.description: A physical attack in which the user charges and slams into the target with its whole body.

moves.name: Peck
moves.description: The target is jabbed with a sharply pointed beak or horn.

moves.name: Constrict
moves.description: The target is attacked with long, creeping tentacles or vines. It may also lower the target's Speed stat.

moves.name: Reflect
moves.description: A wondrous wall of light is put up to suppress damage from physical attacks for five turns.

moves.name: Foul Play
moves.description: The user turns the target's power against it. The higher the target's Attack stat, the greater the damage.

moves.name: Swagger
moves.description: The user enrages and confuses the target. However, it also sharply raises the target's Attack stat.

moves.name: Psywave
moves.description: The target is attacked with an odd  psychic wave. The attack varies in intensity.

moves.name: Topsy-Turvy
moves.description: All stat changes affecting the target turn topsy-turvy and become the opposite of what they were.

moves.name: Hypnosis
moves.description: The user employs hypnotic suggestion to make the target fall into a deep sleep.

moves.name: Psybeam
moves.description: The target is attacked with a peculiar ray. It may also cause confusion.

moves.name: Switcheroo
moves.description: The user trades held items with the target faster than the eye can follow.

moves.name: Payback
moves.description: If the user moves after the target, this attack's power will be doubled.

moves.name: Light Screen
moves.description: A wondrous wall of light is put up to suppress damage from special attacks for five turns.

moves.name: Pluck
moves.description: The user pecks the target. If the target is holding a Berry, the user eats it and gains its effect.

moves.name: Psycho Cut
moves.description: The user tears at the target with blades formed by psychic power. Critical hits land more easily.

moves.name: Slash
moves.description: The target is attacked with a slash of claws or blades. Critical hits land more easily.

moves.name: Night Slash
moves.description: The user slashes the target the instant an opportunity arises. Critical hits land more easily.

moves.name: Superpower
moves.description: The user attacks the target with great power. However, it also lowers the user's Attack and Defense.
